messages.page_content:
- Topic: Granting of Servitude at 4200 Burgundy Street
- Summary: The ordinance authorizes the Mayor to enter into an agreement to grant a servitude to an adjacent property owner for encroachments on/over portions of the public right-of-way located at 4200 Burgundy Street. The servitude agreement will incorporate space that is neither needed for public purposes nor shall interfere with the use of the public right-of-way.
- Ordinance Number: 33303
- Votes Summary:
    - Vote 1: Passed - (6 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance was adopted.
- UID: b97b51f1-b5ad-4d88-ad16-bef9140b202f

messages.title: Regular City Council Minutes 6-3-2021

messages.page_content:
- Topic: Amendment of Smoke Free Air Act and Marijuana Regulations
- Summary: The ordinance aims to amend various sections of the City of New Orleans Code related to the Smoke Free Air Act and marijuana regulations. It includes authorizing NOPD to enforce the Smoke Free Air Act via summons only and prohibiting smoking marijuana outside of a private residence. The ordinance also excludes marijuana testing from certain drug testing programs and clarifies the discretion of policy officers not to issue summons for marijuana possession in certain circumstances.
- Ordinance Number: 33,329 and 33,330
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Postponed to 7/1/21 and referred to the Criminal Justice Committee
- Decision/Key Actions: Postponed and referred for further review
- Tags/Keywords: Smoke Free Air Act, marijuana regulations, NOPD enforcement, drug testing, summons
- UID: da32fa1b-e910-49ad-b840-374f6dec0cc5

- Topic: Appropriation of Federal Grant Funds
- Summary: The ordinance seeks to amend the operating budget of the City of New Orleans for the year 2021 by appropriating federal grant funds from Intergovernmental Transfers to the Mayor’s Office of Homeland Security for Federal Emergency Management Agency reimbursement related costs.
- Ordinance Number: 33,331
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: N/A
- Decision/Key Actions: N/A
- Tags/Keywords: Federal grant funds, operating budget, Homeland Security, FEMA reimbursement
- UID: da32fa1b-e910-49ad-b840-374f6dec0cc5

- UID: 399bfc46-2301-4205-ad4e-04248b1ffdb9

- Topic: Amendment of Capital Budget for 2021
- Summary: The ordinance aims to amend the 2021 Capital Budget by de-appropriating funds from certain departments and appropriating funds to others, including the Chief Administrative Office, Department of Property Management, Department of Public Works, and the New Orleans Recreation Development Commission.
- Ordinance Number: CAL. NO. 33,348
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (5 YEAS, 2 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance was passed with some opposition.
- Tags/Keywords: Capital Budget, Appropriation of Funds
- UID: 399bfc46-2301-4205-ad4e-04248b1ffdb9
messages.title: Regular City Council Minutes 6-3-2021

messages.page_content:
- Topic: Cooperative Endeavor Agreement for Bioscience and Health Products
- Summary: This ordinance authorizes the Mayor to enter into a Cooperative Endeavor Agreement with the BioDistrict New Orleans to use undedicated taxes for economic development and bioscience projects within the city.
- Ordinance Number: 33348
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (8 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 1 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance passed with a majority vote.
- Tags/Keywords: Cooperative Endeavor Agreement, BioDistrict New Orleans, economic development, bioscience, taxes
- UID: 78781e03-1c1e-4933-b490-c60d85f8e105

- Topic: Conditional Use for Fast Food Restaurant
- Summary: This ordinance grants an amendment for a conditional use permit to allow a fast food restaurant in a specific district within the city.
- Ordinance Number: 33349
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (6 YEAS, 3 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance passed with a majority vote.
- Tags/Keywords: Conditional use permit, fast food restaurant, zoning
- UID: 78781e03-1c1e-4933-b490-c60d85f8e105

- Topic: Amendment to Short Term Rental Fund
- Summary: This ordinance seeks to amend sections of the City's Code to clarify the status of the Interim Short Term Rental Fund and its use for Short Term Rental enforcement.
- Ordinance Number: 33350
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 2 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance passed with a majority vote.
- Tags/Keywords: Short term rental, fund amendment, enforcement
- UID: 78781e03-1c1e-4933-b490-c60d85f8e105
messages.title: Regular City Council Minutes 6-3-2021

messages.page_content:
- Topic: Living wage increase for city contracts and financial assistance agreements
- Summary: The ordinance aimed to increase the required living wage for city contracts and financial assistance agreements. The council members voted to adopt the ordinance.
- Ordinance Number: 33351
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (6 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance was adopted to increase the living wage for city contracts and financial assistance agreements.
- Tags/Keywords: Living wage, city contracts, financial assistance, ordinance
- UID: 19952af9-d234-4072-81b1-54fe4a7501cb

- Topic: Extension of effectiveness of Vieux Carré Interim Zoning District ordinance
- Summary: The ordinance proposed to extend the effectiveness of the Vieux Carré Interim Zoning District ordinance for an initial period of 180 days. The council members voted to adopt the ordinance.
- Ordinance Number: 33352
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (6 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance was adopted to extend the effectiveness of the Vieux Carré Interim Zoning District ordinance.
- Tags/Keywords: Vieux Carré, zoning district, ordinance extension
- UID: 19952af9-d234-4072-81b1-54fe4a7501cb

- Topic: Motion for Adjournment
- Summary: Councilmember Nguyen moved for adjournment, which was seconded by Councilmember Glapion. The motion was adopted with 6 YEAS and 0 NAYS, with 1 council member absent.
- Decision/Key Actions: The council meeting was adjourned.
- Tags/Keywords: Adjournment, council meeting, motion
- UID: 19952af9-d234-4072-81b1-54fe4a7501cb
